title: SnowflakeNetwork
author: SnowflakeNetwork
content: Snowflake Network ~ Semi Smart ContractsSemi Smart contracts is an easy way to create tokens on the Snowflake Network using the SFP (Snowflake Protocol). We just released (on the 24th of May 2022) Semi Smart Contracts for Snowflake Network! Please download the release for Linux and Windows on github: Download Release v1.0.0.If you have any issues or questions, you can ask them on our Discord.Using the Snowflake Frost Wallet it will give you the opportunity to create tokens on the Snowflake Network! There could still be some issues in the Snowflake Frost Wallet. If you find any or want to make a suggestions, please create an issue in Github or send us a message on Discord.These are features that are currently implemented in the Snowflake Frost Wallet:Quote- Showing fiat currency trough coinpaprika and coingecko- Enable and disabled receiving and send sounds- Switch SFP Node and Daemon address- Resync wallet from wallet creation- Sending and receiving SNW coins- Sending and receiving tokens- Resync wallet from block 0- Rewind wallet 1000 blocks- Customizable fee amount- Change fiat currency- Creating tokens - Minting tokens- DarkmodeThere are 2 token types, 'Community Token' and 'Private Token'. The only real difference is that 'Private Tokens' can never hold any value and should not be on an exchange.'Private Tokens' can be used in private groups like a book club or in game nights to reward each other with tokens.Upcoming v1.0.1 Features:Quote- Burning Tokens and NFTs- Staking- NFTsInstagram: https://instagram.com/snowflake.networkTelegram: https://t.me/+1L08X7prnC01ODJkTwitter: https://twitter.com/snowflakenetwDiscord: https://discord.gg/4f8bvZaJrsMax Supply: 15,000,000 SNWMinimum Fee: 5000 Flakes*Algorithm: Argon2id/ChukwaBlock Unlock Window: 10Block Time: 2.5 MinutesBlock Reward: 1 SNWTicker/Prefix: SNWDecimals: 8*1 Flake = 0.00000001 SNW[/size]
